components

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.DBConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModuleConnection, ProgrammeConnection, RegisterConnection, StudentConnection

    public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a connection with Apache Derby Database.
